entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 97 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
